name: Crystal-Clear2
description:
Visit Civitai-Crystal team on discord! -updates, news, development, beta program

Crystal Clear2 is available on RunDiffusion.com, Join their discord!

Crystal Clear 2

Now you can generate images as high as 2048x696 with no fix or upscaling required.

Works best for landscapes and panoramic views.

Unleash your creativity by using high CFGs to create new types of art.

Examples in the gallery.

This model is the accumulated result of many testing hours, training, feedback and minute detail improvements, upon the Crystal framework, done by an entire team of people.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

Try it on RunDiffusion where you can generate your favorite CIVITAI models or train new.

The model was created to produce clean, noiseless and unrivaled image quality, while improving the colors and sharpness.

Features and changes:

  • clean and noiseless renders

  • ability to produce raw images at high resolutions (no fix or upscaling)

  • adjustments to color vibrancy

  • adjustments to shadows and exposure

  • designed to output images at high CFGs without quality degradation

  • lessened the anime style influence of the model (compared to Crystal-Clear 1)

  • smaller file size for the full version (compared to Crystal-Clear 1)

  • ability to produce a wide range of styles per seed while maintaining consistency

Note: This is not a photorealistic model, it will not produce real looking elements.

There is a Crystal-Photorealistic version in development.

modelVersions.name: Crystal-Clear2_v1
modelVersions.description:
Crystal-Clear2_v1 purpose is to create noiseless raw high-resolution images with unrivaled image quality, color and sharpness, even at a high CFGs.

Based on an improved Crystal mainframe trained locally.
